caption:
This photograph offers a stark contrast between nature and industrial activity. In the foreground, there's a desolate yet natural landscape comprising a dry, scrubby field under a clear sky. A young woman, wearing a blue jacket and a skirt, watches a small herd of sheep grazing in this area. She appears to be involved in shepherding or looking after the flock, emphasizing a pastoral scene.

In the stark background, the juxtaposition is clear with the presence of a large industrial facility. Several large structures with visible piping and scaffolding dominate the scene, alongside multiple tall chimneys emitting thick, white smoke that blends into the sky. This creates a visual representation of industry versus nature.

The overall composition uses these contrasting elements to likely comment on environmental issues, the balance between pastoral life and industrial growth, or the encroachment of industrialization into natural landscapes.
title: Power plant and sheep herder. (From the Sites exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 27, 31, 32, 33.)
